thread.title: Shane Ray, Broncos LB, carted off field with knee injury vs. Browns
thread.title_full: Shane Ray, Broncos LB, carted off field with knee injury vs. Browns - The Denver Post

author: Nicki Jhabvala
title: Shane Ray, Broncos LB, carted off field with knee injury vs. Browns
text:
CLEVELAND â€” The Broncos' depth at outside linebacker is dwindling.
Shane Ray, the Broncos' first-round draft pick this year, was carted off the field after injuring his knee in a play during the second quarter on Sunday.
Ray got caught in the fray on a tackle and had to be helped off the field by two trainers. He took a seat on the bench, and was visibly shaken by the injury, holding his head in his hands as teammates tried to console him.
He was taken back to the locker room shortly after and at halftime was ruled out to return.
The Broncos already are without starting outside linebacker DeMarcus Ware, who was ruled out Friday with a back injury.
Shaquil Barrett started in place of Ware, but the latest injury leaves Lerentee McCray as the lone backup for Barrett and Von Miller.
Stay tuned for updates on Ray's injury.
Nicki Jhabvala: njhabvala@denverpost.com or @NickiJhabvala
